timeline.bodyText:
Can just use a forEach directly on the map:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap
          
          
            
                      .keySet()
          
          
            
                      .forEach(
          
          
            
                          stateRoot ->
          
          
            
                              transaction.put(
          
          
            
                                  V3Schema.STATE_ROOT_TO_SLOT_AND_BLOCK_ROOT,
          
          
            
                                  stateRoot,
          
          
            
                                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap.get(stateRoot)));
          
          
            
                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap
          
          
            
                      .forEach(
          
          
            
                          (stateRoot, blockRoot) ->
          
          
            
                              transaction.put(
          
          
            
                                  V3Schema.STATE_ROOT_TO_SLOT_AND_BLOCK_ROOT,
          
          
            
                                  stateRoot,
          
          
            
                                  blockRoot));
